headline: 3 Out-of-Favor Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: The past year hasn't been kind to the stocks featured in this article. Each has tumbled to their lowest points in 12 months, leaving investors to decide whether they're witnessing fire sales or falling knives.

raw.headline: 3 Out-of-Favor Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals

headline: Sixteenth Service Award Win Might Change The Case For Investing In Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL)
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line was recognized in early October 2025 as the top national less-than-truckload carrier for the 16th consecutive year by Mastio & Company, leading in 23 out of 28 national service categories according to feedback from over 1,630 logistics professionals. This long-running recognition highlights the company's ongoing commitment to high service quality and customer trust, even as it faces a period of expected earnings softness. We'll explore how Old Dominion's consistent...
